title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.21 - Vehicle windows to be free of cracks, blisters, discoloration and like defects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.21 - Vehicle windows to be free of cracks, blisters, discoloration and like defects

State Regulations

The windshields and/or windows of an automotive vehicle
or piece of mobile equipment shall be free of cracks, blisters, discoloration
or any defect causing distortion or obstruction of the vision of the operator
thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
